title: [GAMEPLAY] Murder Bridge?
body: I was playing a game of ARAM today, and instead of saying "Welcome to the Howling Abyss", it said "Welcome to the Murder Bridge" (the text on-screen was correct though).  I've played hundreds of ARAM games and have never had anything like that happen.  No one else in the game heard the murder bridge audio, and the replay has the correct audio.  The game in question is [this one](http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2532289605/).

replies.body: It's intended, it's an easter egg. :3

> It's intended, it's an easter egg. :3

This is probably like the 1000th time you've seen a post like this but.....how about that Butcher's Bridge though? Riot please?
im guessing it is either a teaser to bring back butchers bridge or its just an audio mixup
It's been like this for years. It's just a very rare into phrase.
This^ and i believe blue side vendors says it on spawn sometimes
He has a few phrases about it.
one of the vendors routinely calls it murder bridge. you must have just never realised it before
its normal... i have seen it happen like 4 times in 5 years playing but i dont play ARAM anymore. not since season 4
This is normal. It's a very rare intro phrase that can be said instead of "Welcome to the Howling Abyss". I know this since I have about 2500 aram games played.
